Waiters() - Constructor for class project.restaurant.models.Waiters
This constructor builds an empty waiter.
Waiters(Integer, Users) - Constructor for class project.restaurant.models.Waiters
This constructor builds a waiter with all its characteristics.
WaitersRepository - Interface in project.restaurant.repository
JpaRepository is a collection of APIs used for basic operations and sorting, and WaitersRepository extends this collection to modify 'Waiters' table.
